verses.roman:
'pradyumna brahmacārī'--tāṅra nija-nāma
'nṛsiṁhānanda' nāma tāṅra kailā gaura-dhāma

synonyms: pradyumna brahmacārī—Pradyumna Brahmacārī; tāṅra—his; nija-nāma—real name; nṛsiṁhānanda—Nṛsiṁhānanda; nāma—name; tāṅra—his; kailā gaura-dhāma—was given by Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: His real name was Pradyumna Brahmacārī. The name Nṛsiṁhānanda had been given to him by Lord Gaurasundara Himself.
